name: tidycloset
0:
”Alexa, open tidy closet”
”Alexa, ask tidy closet”
”Alexa, launch tidy closet”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tidy closet
des: I used a template to create this skill. You can ask Alexa to help you decide what you should do with your clothes. The four decisions are : keep it, toss it, return it or donate it. This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by Dannyco. This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by DANNYCO
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
